tee5CE9QCf2LRJnTz.name: Flashbacks (to inherited memories)
tee5CE9QCf2LRJnTz.notes: In any situation that the GM feels is stressful, he will roll 3d. On a 6 or less, you have a flashback. The GM will roll whenever you miss a Fright Check or make the roll exactly, and whenever you fail a self-control roll for another stress-related disadvantage.

mIHCUt7tDLD2t8dXG.name: Mild
mIHCUt7tDLD2t8dXG.notes: Duration: 2d seconds; -2 on all skill rolls

mktLlBvXtakjVh6Ac.name: Severe
mktLlBvXtakjVh6Ac.notes: Duration: 1d minutes; -5 on all skill rolls

m3_AuSCH33xHwnty5.name: Crippling
m3_AuSCH33xHwnty5.notes: Duration: 3d minutes; Precludes all skill use
